about_the_game:
THE PUTTER IS MIGHTIER THAN THE SWORD!

Mighty Mini Golf is a wild mini golf experience like no other! Golf through several crazy courses where everything is on the line, including your life-- that's right, in Mighty Mini Golf, you can die on the green! Of course, by official MMG rules, that's triple stroke penalty. Compete in mini golf madness in both solo and multiplayer modes, each being its own unique experience!

WACKY HAZARDS AND CRAZY HOLES!

Look out, the courses of Mighty Mini Golf include all kinds of wild hazards like you've never seen! Dodge the dangerous attacks of acid-spitting dinosaurs, utilize boost pads the shoot your ball forward and burn up the course if you can put to them accurately. Golf across high-speed traffic, around charging triceratops, or near grumpy garbage men whipping batteries at you from a garbage scow. Nothing is off the table in the world of Mighty Mini Golf!

SINGLE-PLAYER GOLF-VENTURE!

The single player mode takes on its own form with elaborate map screens, pulse-pounding boss fights, and exciting mini games! Collect keys by beating the best scores and unlock new paths to find courses and other bonuses! Battle a ferocious fire-breathing T-Rex with only your wits and golf skills! Win prizes testing your skills at mini games like Break the Targets!

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER EXCITEMENT!

Battle your friends, enemies, or even frenemies at one on one mini golf! In the world of Mighty Mini Golf, don't worry about boring things like "golf etiquette" or "taking turns." Golf at the same time while avoiding hazards, hitting each other with clubs, and making your opponent's life difficult with a series of wacky items! That's right, the spirit of kart games carries on into the world of Mighty Mini Golf! Get your opponent stung by dropping a hive full of angry bees, slip up both them and their ball with banana peels, or pelt them with tomatoes!

A SHOP FULL OF UNLOCKABLES!

Earn birdie coins by finding them on the course, or of course, by scoring a birdie on any hole! You can exchange these coins for all kinds of rewards including five new playable characters!

Fight and block hazards with swings of your club, fight dangerous bosses in single player mode, and explore map screens and unlock new characters and courses!
